name: drop in image slideshow gallery
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
This drop in image slideshow gallery is your regular image slideshow, except each image is dropped into view. It works all major browsers.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/drop-in-image-slideshow-gallery/

Live Demo
More info
Comments/Suggestion
About author

This drop in image slide show gallery is your regular image slideshow plugin, except each image is dropped into view. this effect that works in all major browsers. The slideshow stops dropping when the mouse is over it.

Feature

  • Simple customization.
  • Easy installation.
  • Widgets, so you can add pretty much anything.
  • Easy slideshow size (width & height) override option.
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 2 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Tamil (ta) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.faq:
1. How to arrange the width & height of the slideshow?

  2. How to change the drop delay time

  3. Where to upload my image?

  4. how the slide show manages the order?

Answers : http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/drop-in-image-slideshow-gallery/

7.0

Tested up to 3.4.1
Java script loaded by using the wp_enqueue_scripts hook (instead of the init hook)
Now this plug-in will support .JPEG and .PNG files

Tested up to 3.1.2
Before you update 4.0. Please take back up of your images if you have any images in this folder “wp-content/plugins/drop-in-image-slideshow-gallery/”.

3.0

Tested up to 3.0.

2.1

The slideshow stops rotating when the mouse is over it.
Created link on image click
use ‘All image link’ text field to give link to images

2.0

First version.
